'''Archaic Petra''' is an [[Artifact Set]] available at [[:Category:4-Star Artifacts|4-star]] and [[:Category:5-Star Artifacts|5-star]] rarities which can be obtained from [[Domain of Guyun]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*4-Piece Bonus:
**The character with the artifact set equipped must be the one to pick up the Elemental Shard in order for the party to gain the DMG Bonus.
